description.en_US: Screech to draw enemies' attention towards you.
Vibrate your shield at an enemy. Powerful attack with smaller range.
Catch your enemies in a fierce air combo with massive damage.
description.de_DE: Fängt die Gegner in einer tödlichen Luftkombination mit schwerem Schaden.
description.zh_CN: 使用强大的风暴连续打击敌人，造成巨大伤害。
description.ja_JP: 敵に激しい空中コンボを叩き込み、大ダメージを与える攻撃。
description.ko_KR: 엄청난 대미지의 맹렬한 에어 콤보에 적을 가둡니다.

description.en_US: Fire a powerful projectile that will fly through enemies, knocking them back.
Fire a powerful projectile which explodes on contact, blasting enemies away.
Creates a damage-reducing shield, lasting for a couple of seconds.
description.de_DE: Erschafft einen Schild gegen Schaden, welcher ein paar Sekunden hält.
description.zh_CN: 制造一个减伤护盾，效果可持续数秒钟。
description.ja_JP: ダメージを吸収するシールドを数秒間発生させる。
description.ko_KR: 몇 초간 받는 대미지를 감소하는 방어막을 만듭니다.

description.en_US: Creates a damage-reducing shield that also repels nearby enemies for several seconds.
A blazing thrust of fire piercing through enemies in front of you.
description.de_DE: Eine Feuerstoß der Gegner vor dir durchstößt.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_CN: 使用一团猛烈的火焰攻击你前方的敌人，造成\c[3]燃烧\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 前方の敵を貫く、燃え盛る炎の攻撃。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 눈앞에 있는 적을 관통하며 불에 태우는 공격입니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: A controllable blazing burst of fire that deals damage over a small area.
description.de_DE: Ein lodernder Feuerstoß der Schaden in einem kleinen Bereich anrichtet.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_CN: 在一小块区域内施放火焰并造成伤害。产生\c[3]燃烧\c[0]效果。可以控制方向！<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 操作可能な火炎を放射し、小範囲にダメージを与える。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 작은 범위에 대미지를 입히는 조종 가능한 불타는 폭발입니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Creates a ring of fire around you, dealing damage to enemies walking into it.
description.de_DE: Erschafft einen Ring aus Flammen um dich herum, der nahen Gegnern Schaden zufügt.
description.zh_CN: 在你周围制造一道火圈，对接近的敌人造成伤害。
description.ja_JP: 自分の周りに炎の輪を発生させる。輪に触れた敵はダメージを受ける。
description.ko_KR: 자신 주변에 불의 고리를 만들어 그 안에 들어오는 적에게 대미지를 입힙니다.

description.en_US: Create a long lasting fire circle that erupts in flaming outbursts several times.
description.zh_CN: 创造一道持续时间较长的火焰之环，能够喷射火焰多次。
description.ja_JP: 自分の周りに長時間持続する炎の円が現れる。円は数回に渡って燃え上がり爆発する。
description.ko_KR: 오랜 시간 몇 번의 불꽃이 분출되는 불의 원을 만듭니다.
description.de_DE: Erschaffe einen lang anhaltenden Feuerkreis, der in starken Eruptionen Feuer ausspeit.

description.en_US: Summon a flame that attracts enemies to you for five seconds.
Summon a flame that trails fire behind you and attracts enemies to you for five seconds.
Hit an enemy to throw them back and slow them down.
Hit an enemy to throw them back and encase them in ice and icicles.
Hurl an enemy into a circle of icy death.
Hit enemies with a big snow explosion, caging them within icicles.
description.de_DE: Triff Gegner mit einer großen Schneeexplosion, die sie in Eiskristalle einsperrt.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_CN: 用雪球爆炸对敌人造成伤害，并使其困于冰柱之中。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 雪の爆発を起こし、当たった敵をつららの檻に閉じ込める。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 큰 눈 폭발로 적을 공격하고 고드름 안에 가둡니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Shoot a large snow ball, leaving an icicle trail and caging enemies with multiple icicles.
description.de_DE: Wirf einen Schneeball, der eine Spur aus Eiszapfen hinterläßt und Gegner einsperrt.<<C<<Row<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_CN: 射出一枚大型的雪球，留下一道冰锥之径，并以多枚冰锥覆盖敌人。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 巨大な雪玉を発射し、当たった敵をつららの檻に閉じ込める。雪玉の通った後につららが発生する。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 거대한 눈 뭉치를 쏘며, 고드름 길을 만들고 적을 다수의 고드름에 가둡니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Shoot a gigantic snow ball, leaving an icicle trail and splitting into multiple smaller snow balls on impact.

name.ja_JP: インディゴストライク

description.en_US: Dash with high speed, leaving a trail of icicles behind you, damaging enemies on contact.
description.de_DE: Sprinte und hinterlasse einen Pfad voller Eiskristalle, welche Gegner bei Berührung verletzen.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_CN: 高速冲刺，在冲刺路线上留下一道冰柱，并对接触的敌人造成伤害。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 高速でダッシュし、通った後につららを残す。つららに触れた敵はダメージを受ける。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 고속으로 대시하고 뒤에 고드름 길을 남겨 이에 닿는 적에게 대미지를 가합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Dash a long distance, leaving icicles which create multiple additional icicle trails.
description.de_DE: Stürme über eine lange Distanz während Eiszapfen aus dem Boden kommen, die wiederum weitere Eispfade erzeugen.<<C<<Row<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_CN: 猛冲一长段距离，在身后留下冰锥，额外生成多条冰锥之径。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 長距離をダッシュし、通った後につららを残す。このつららはさらにつららの列をいくつか発生させる。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 장거리를 대시하고 다수의 추가 고드름 길을 만드는 고드름을 남깁니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Blast enemies away and spawn several icicles in front of you, blocking projectiles and damaging enemies on contact.
description.de_DE: Stoße Gegner weg und erschaffe einige Eiskristalle vor dir, die Projektile blocken und Gegner bei Berührung verletzen.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_CN: 在你的前方召唤出树根冰柱，阻挡敌人的射击。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 近くにいる敵を吹き飛ばし、つららを前方に数個発生させる。つららは触れた敵にダメージを与え、飛び道具も防いでくれる。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 적을 날려버리고 자신의 앞에 다수의 고드름을 생성해 발사체를 막고 이에 닿는 적에 대미지를 가합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

name.ja_JP: アイス・フォートレス

description.en_US: Spawn multiple icicles around you and create a protective but slowing shield that hurt enemies on contact.
description.de_DE: Beschwöre mehrere Eiszapfen um dich herum und erzeuge einen verlangsamenden aber nützlichen Schild, der Gegner bei Kontakt verletzt.<<C<<Row<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/10/04]
description.zh_CN: 在身周衍生多枚冰锥，并创造一道具有防护性，但会减慢速度的护盾。对触碰的敌人造成伤害。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/10/04]
description.ja_JP: 周りにつららを発生させる。触れた敵にダメージを与えるシールドも発生させるが、動きは遅くなる。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/10/04]
description.ko_KR: 주변에 다수의 고드름을 생성해 자신을 보호해 주지만 느려지는 방어막을 만들어 이에 닿는 적에게 대미지를 줍니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/10/04]

description.en_US: Winter is here. Summon multiple huge icicles around you and create a protective but slow barrier that hurts enemies.
description.de_DE: Winter ist hier. Beschwöre mehrere Eiszapfen, die um dich herum einen Schutzwall bilden, der deinen Gegnern Schaden zufügt.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_CN: 寒冬已至。在你的身边召唤数枚巨型冰枪，然后创造一个可以伤害敌人的保护性屏障。造成\c[3]寒冷\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 無慈悲なる冬の到来。自身の周りに巨大なつららを複数召喚するとともに、バリアを発生させる。バリアは移動力と引き換えに防御力を高め、触れた敵にダメージを与える。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 겨울이 다가왔습니다. 주변에 다수의 거대 고드름을 소환하며, 적에게 피해를 주고 방어력을 갖췄지만 느린 방벽을 생성합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Hit a single enemy into the air following up with a lightning strike.
description.de_DE: Schlage einen einzelnen Gegner in die Luft, gefolgt von einem Blitzschlag.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_CN: 击飞单体敌人，然后用闪电攻击。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 敵単体を空に叩き上げ、雷で追撃する攻撃。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 하나의 적을 공중으로 띄운 뒤 번개로 공격합니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Throw a projectile that creates a delayed lightning bolt damaging everything around it.
description.de_DE: Wirf ein Projektil, das einen verzögerten Blitz erzeugt und alles in der Nähe trifft.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_CN: 投掷标记，一段延迟后造对周围敌人造成闪电伤害。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 電撃を放つ攻撃。当たった敵には一瞬遅れて雷が落ち、その周囲にもダメージが行く。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 발사체 주변에 있는 모든 것에 번갯불의 딜레이 대미지를 가하는 발사체를 던집니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Dash away and leave behind a charged spike, which will zap the next enemy that approaches it.
Dash away and leave behind a charged tower, which will zap  enemies that approaches it up to five times.
Dash away and leave behind a grid of charged towers, which will zap  enemies that approach them up to five times each.
Frontal attack with high damage, sending all hit enemies flying.
description.de_DE: Starker Frontalangriff, der Gegner weit wegstößt.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_CN: 面向前方的高伤害攻击，可将所有命中的敌人击飞。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 前方の敵を遠くに吹き飛ばす、高ダメージの攻撃。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 높은 대미지의 정면 공격으로, 공격받은 모든 적을 날려버립니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Shoots a projectile that knocks a single enemy back a considerable distance..
Shoots a large projectile that travels through and knocks back any enemies it hits.
Unleash a large barrage of repelling blasts.
Spawns aura that pushes away nearby enemies for several seconds.
description.de_DE: Aktiviert eine Aura, die nahe Gegner für einige Sekunden wegstößt.
description.zh_CN: 召唤一个光环，在数秒内阻挡周围敌人靠近。
description.ja_JP: 近くの敵を押し返すオーラを、自身の周囲に数秒間発生させる。
description.ko_KR: 근처의 적을 몇 초간 밀어내는 아우라를 생성합니다.

description.en_US: Spawns aura that pushes away nearby enemies and throws projectiles for several seconds.
description.zh_CN: 衍生光环，击退附近的敌人，并能在几秒钟之内投掷飞弹。
description.ja_JP: 近くの敵を押し返し、さらに弾丸も発射するオーラを、自身の周囲に数秒間発生させる。
description.ko_KR: 근처의 적을 몇 초간 밀어내고 발사체를 던지는 아우라를 생성합니다.
description.de_DE: Erschafft eine Aura, die nahestehende Gegner zurückdrängt und Projektile auf sie feuert.

description.en_US: Dash away and leave behind a decoy, distracting your foes.
description.de_DE: Sprinte und hinterlasse eine Lockvogel, der deine Feinde ablenkt.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/09/02]
description.zh_CN: 冲刺离开，并留下一个可以误导敌人的诱饵。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/09/02]
description.ja_JP: ダッシュで離脱しつつ、敵の注意を引く残像を残す。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/09/02]
description.ko_KR: 대시로 도망간 뒤 적을 교란하는 미끼를 남깁니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/09/02]
